definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to act cute/putting on adorable airs/to pretend to be lovely

sentences.english: He even calls her by a cute nickname, "Snips."
sentences.chinese: 他甚至用一个可爱的昵称，“小鬼头”来叫她。

sentences.english: You are the most loving and caring person any friend could ever have.
sentences.chinese: 您是夫复何求最可爱最贴心的朋友。

sentences.english: They're kinda cute when they're not quite big enough to trample you.
sentences.chinese: 当他们没有长大到足够攻击你的时候，还是很可爱的。

sentences.english: He is a lovely boy but he has no family.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个可爱的男孩，但是却失去了家人。

sentences.english: I followed this kitty all around the places, and finally got this lovely shot.
sentences.chinese: 我追著它绕来绕去，最后终于等到这张可爱的照片。

sentences.english: She is fairer than the morning star, and whiter than the moon.
sentences.chinese: 她比那晨星更可爱，比月亮更皎洁。

sentences.english: She is a scatty but charming girl.
The colours used are a selection of lovely soft greens and pinks.
sentences.chinese: 采用的颜色是一系列可爱的淡绿色和粉红色。

sentences.english: These two kittens on this piece of double-sided embroidery look like real ones. They are really lovable.
sentences.chinese: 这幅双面绣上的两只小猫维妙维肖，可爱极了。

sentences.english: Sweet Adeline: Why Was I Born?
sentences.chinese: 《可爱的艾德琳》中的“为何生我？”

sentences.english: Who’s the cutest kitty in the world?
sentences.chinese: 谁是这个世界上最可爱的猫咪呀？

sentences.english: Jenna was always happy and bubbly, a lovely person.
sentences.chinese: 珍娜总是很高兴，生气勃勃的，是一个可爱的人。

sentences.english: There are so many adorable girl schnauzers here in the Lover Zone.
sentences.chinese: 在情人区有好多可爱的小雪妹妹。

sentences.english: Only nature wreaks such lovely havoc.
sentences.chinese: 只有自然才搞那么可爱的破坏。

sentences.english: A thief had a son who had lovely curls.
sentences.chinese: 一个小偷有个长着可爱卷发的儿子。

definition: to sprout/to bud/to have a strong affection for (slang)/adorable (loanword from Japanese 萌え moe, slang describing affection for a cute character)
(coll.) presenting as unfriendly and blunt, but warm and tender inside (loanword from Japanese "tsundere")
